name: Summer Camp School Trip 2018
description:
School bus has come to our bus stop. Come in, sit down and feel yourself comfortable. School Kids are waiting to be picked up, to get dropped to their primary and high schools. Collect all your stuff and reach school on time. Girls, kids and toddlers reach up the school on your bicycle and enjoy the bike riding mania before leaving on the trip from school. Dropping off school kids on time is the challenge for any school bus driver in this school bus trip driving simulator. So, start your engine, get on the road and take your coach to school for city tour!
Have you ever play the concept of school trip? No, don’t worry. The best bus simulator game is here. Let’s have some crazy fun and drive a big yellow School Bus! This game will make you sit in the front seat of a School bus and let you maneuver around the road. School Bus Driving Simulator is developed especially for ambitious drivers who feel they are ready to do the job of city School Bus Driver. This school bus driving game is a little unique in the sense that you required to perform your duties in big city and industrial area with heavy traffic. Sometimes you have to start before the sunrise to drop the Industrial workers and rush back for your school duties. Basically, city tour or trip makes kids and students happy because they always make virtual plan for school trips and friends gathering. It will improve self-confidence and self-esteem in adventurous kids. All of School kids wants to cherish their life with friends at good atmosphere to enhance adventures of school trip in bus. Kids can also learn time management by playing this “City School Trip Adventure 2017” game.
Select the bus and drive through the city. Go ahead towards front seat as the school bus driver, and pick up passenger kids and drop them ahead to their destinations in your school bus. Consider yourself as the crazy school bus driver; in charge of the public bus transport, all you have to do is to give your school kids a safe and sound drive round the city, pick and drop them to their destinations in this bus driver simulator game. You have to avoid the collisions with the traffic vehicles in order to pick and drop the school students safe and sound. School bus driving simulator is a game for everyone that would like to keep those driving skills up to date, you need to practice everything from parking, reversing and use your mental skills to keep calm. Their safety is in your hands! Drive safe and drive on time!
In City school tour bus Driving 2017 your mission is to safely pick and drop the kids by driving your school bus! All the great animations and the driving thrill make this City school Bus Driver Simulator as one of the best bus driving Parking games of 2017.

FEATURES:
- School Bus Driving Experience
- Explore the Big City Environment
- Pick and Drop School Kids
- A Unique Concept for School Going Kids
- Amazing Gameplay with HD Graphics
- Play as a Virtual Bus Driver
- .Realistic city environment Map
- Animated school kids idle, walking, entering/exiting the bus
- Intelligent Traffic System
- Realistic visual damage
- Cool and smooth graphics
- Amazing Bus Selection mode
